## Neighbourhood profiles - 2016 census

```{r neighbourhood-profiles-metadata, results = "asis"}
neighbourhood_profiles_metadata <- readr::read_csv(here::here("data-raw", "census_profiles_2016", "clean", "metadata.csv"))

neighbourhood_profiles_metadata %>%
  mutate(text = glue::glue("
                           * **{Field}**: {Description}
                               {processing}
                           ",
    processing = ifelse(!is.na(`Additional Processing`), glue::glue("* {`Additional Processing`}"), "")
  )) %>%
  pull(text)
```
